text: Air conditioned. There is a queue but it clears fast. Favourite bachormee! Pork lard is fragrant and crispy, noodles and sauce balances well. Sometimes the auntie will forget your order.

This has got to be my family‚Äôs go-to-place for our favourite Teochew-style bak chor mee [a.k.a. minced meat noodles] ‚Äòcause we are here for a meal nearly every week.
The stall is located in an air-conditioned food court within Taman Jurong shopping centre and we spotted the 1st generation owner of 58 Minced Meat Noodle at this stall!
Each bowl comes with slices of liver cooked perfectly, just the way we like it ‚Äî tender & soft, as well as minced meat, pork slices, sliced mushroom and crowned üëë with plenty of fragrant & crispy lard.
On the side, the bowl of clear soup broth actually packs a ton of flavour. Finally, for those who prefers bolder & stronger flavour [like me!], there‚Äôs a bottle of black vinegar placed at the counter so that I can add as much as I want to. üòç

This is the branch of the famous 58 Minced Meat Noodles which is located at the opposite Taman Jurong Market and Food Center. Don‚Äôt ask me why they opened another outlet so close by at Taman Jurong Shopping Canter‚Äôs 399 Food Court. The cook is a senior lady and the one taking orders is an elderly man.

Personally, I think this stall tastes better than the original one opposite. As usual I ordered Mee Kia Dry with chilli. $4. Portion is adequate and the noodles were cooked just nice, a bit al dente. The soup was well infused with porcine flavours from all the blanching of minced and sliced pork and liver. Give the noodles a good toss to ensure each strand is well coated with their chilli sauce and vinegar to get the perfect balance in taste. Really yummy.

The food court is rather popular but small so getting a table during meal times may be a challenge. Fortunately people here are very chill and you can easily ask to share a table with folks eating alone.

Cheap and good. Strongly recommended!

My go to BCM in the west.
Al Dente noodles with a really good chilli and vinegar mix!
